name: #1 Button Presser
description:
Your boss has given you a task of utmost importance. You are to press a red button every 10 seconds or less - you don’t want to find out what happens if you don’t… 

Like the good worker you are you start doing your task, yet your co-worker keeps annoying you by bragging about his high score in the mini game “the amazing asteroids”. You decide to kill two birds with one stone and try beating your co-worker’s high score whilst also continuing to press the button. Watch out though, because it turns out that various things will try to get in your way. Will you be able to succeed?
